text: Surekha Sikri Rege (19 April 1945 16 July 2021) was an Indian actress. Her career began in 1978 with the movie Kissa Kursi Ka. She won awards for her roles in Tamas (1988), Mammo (1995) and Badhaai Ho (2018). Sikri was born in New Delhi. Sikri died on 16 July 2021 in Mumbai from cardiac arrest caused by multiple strokes, aged 76. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Indian stage actors Category:Indian voice actors Category:Actors from New Delhi
title: Surekha Sikri
